description: Try our easy to follow Green Curry Lamb Racks With Pea Puree recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Green Curry Lamb Racks With Pea Puree
name: Green Curry Lamb Racks With Pea Puree | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 0.25 cup Valcom Authentic Thai Green Curry Paste
0.5 cup canned tcc premium coconut milk

recipeInstructions.text: Cut lamb racks into cutlets. Divide rice and pea puree between plates. Top with lamb, snow peas, chilli and coriander, then serve.
